name: Euclidean Rhythm Sequencer
description:
Create or generate beat patterns based around Euclidean rhythms on your Commodore 64.  Navigate with the joystick in PORT 2 and hold fire and a direction to modify parameters.

RND will generate a random pattern for the currently selected pattern.

Try add some ECHO for some neat effects, especially when an OCTAVE accent is on an off beat.

AUTO will mix up your patterns further creating hypnotic patterns.

COPY and PASTE patterns to quickly build up your sequences.
